name: Minerva's Library
description:
Enter Minerva's Library, where a curse runs free and the stories that surround you come to life. Use magical cards to aid you in traversing the mystical library as you climb, wall-run, and dodge your way over gaps, past flying books, and around the menacing owl guardians who watch over the library. Will you answer Minerva's call and stop the curse?

Minerva's Library is a 3D puzzle platformer where the player must navigate maps using spawnable platforms and a parkour system in order to reach the end of the level. Your goal is to get to the end of all five levels and end the curse that brought the library to life.

Controls:

Movement = WASD

Jump = Space

Cycle Through Cards = Right Click

Spawn Cards = Left Click

Pause = Escape

Parkour = Run Against A Wall and Jump to Wall Run or Climb

Credits:

Level Design: Austin Dulong, Quintin Connell, Jay Ortiz, Zack Dwyer

Animation: Quintin Connell

Modelling: Amanda LeBlanc, Garret Bryant, 

UI: Kenneth Howell

Coding: Dan Cooper, Cathy Nguyen

Audio: Adam Kallibjian, Dan Tauber, Joe Marchuk
